name: Xuandong Li
content: Welcome to Xuandong Li's Homepage Xuandong Li Professor Department of Computer Science and Technology Nanjing Univeristy Office: Room 720, Changzhou Building, Xianlin Campus Address: Department of Computer Science and Technology, Nanjing University 163 Xianlin Road, Nanjing, Jiangsu, P.R. China 210023. Tel: +86 25 89683671 Fax: +86 25 83300710 Email: lxd@nju.edu.cn Research Affiliation: Member of Research Staff State Key Laboratory for Novel Software Technology Nanjing University. Teaching Formal Languages and Automata, Fall 2019. Software Engineering, Fall 2009. Programming with Pascal, Fall 2000. Research Formal support for design and analysis of reactive, disturbed, real-time, hybrid, and cyber-physical systems; Software testing and verification; Model driven software development; Service oriented computing. Selected Publications Tools BACH: Bounded Reachability Checker for Linear Hybrid Automata TASS: Timing Analyzer of Scenario-Based Specifications UIMDRIVER: UML Interaction Model Driven Runtime Verifier Projects Current Projects Symbolic execution based testing and verification of complex software systems, supported by the National Natural Science Foundation of China (No.61632015), 2017-2021 Intelligent techniques for software testing and verification, supported by the National Key Research and Development Program of China (No.2016YFB1000802), 2016-2019 Completed Projects Research Groups SEG: Software Engineering Group at NJU Interesting Links Last updated: Nov. 10, 2001.
